pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Sweet Almond Oil 200ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

An enriching oil suitable for moisturising skin, massage and aromatherapy blending. An all time favourite used by massage therapists. It is cold pressed and produced without chemicals or heat to ensure the optimum concentration of all the natural nutrients found in the original Almond Kernel.

Warnings

STORE BELOW 30C. NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.

Ingredients

Prunus dulcis seed fixed oil

Directions

To make an aromatherapy massage oil, add 5 drops of your favourite essential oil to 10ml Sweet Almond oil.
